# I have successfully moved closer to the coal resource patch. 
# Now, I will attempt to place the Stone Furnace again.

# Step 9: Place the Stone Furnace at the coal resource patch
furnace = place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, position=resource_position)  # Place the furnace at the coal resource patch.
print(f"Placed Stone Furnace at {resource_position}.")  # Output the placement information.
